title: Jennifer Lopez's Talks About Marc Anthony on Live With Kelly
text:
Amid substantial rumors that she's dating Alex Rodriguez, Jennifer Lopez recently appeared on Live With Kelly to rave about another important man in her life: Marc Anthony .
During her interview, Jennifer began talking about her adorable twins , Emme and Maximilian, and how grateful she is to coparent with her ex-husband who she affectionately referred to as her "best friend."
Related:
A Look Back at Jennifer Lopez and Marc Anthony's Sweet Relationship
She also confirmed that Marc is helping her produce a Spanish-language album . While she was hesitant about the idea at first, Jennifer said the experience has ultimately brought them together. "It's been awesome. Honestly, I think it's even helped our relationship," she said. Adding, "We're just in a really great place. The kids, they get to spend time with the two of us more together and see us working together.
The stunning star then answered the question on everyone's mind: would she they ever remarry? To that, she vehemently said "no." Jennifer explained, "We're really good the way we are. We're always going to be great friends."
